patch.job: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentcomment` ( `id_comment` mediumint(64) NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_user` mediumint(64) default NULL, `is_moderate` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `commentDate` datetime NOT NULL, `commentData` mediumtext collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `commentGood` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `commentBad` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `commentAvg` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_comment`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentrate` ( `id_rate` mediumint(64) NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_user` mediumint(64) default NULL, `rateDate` datetime NOT NULL, `rateValue` int(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_rate`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentitem` ( `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `contentItemUrl` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `contentItemType` varchar(15) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `contentItemMime` varchar(15) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `contentItemHeight` mediumint(6) default NULL, `contentItemWidth` mediumint(6) default NULL, `contentItemWeight` mediumint(64) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_content`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentcommentrate` ( `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_comment` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_user` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `commentRateDate` datetime NOT NULL, `commentRateValue` int(1) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `id_comment_2` (`id_comment`,`id_user`), KEY `id_comment` (`id_comment`), KEY `id_user` (`id_user`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentalbum` ( `id_album` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `pos_album` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `same` (`id_album`,`id_content`), KEY `id_album` (`id_album`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentcommentrate` ( `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_comment` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_user` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `commentRateDate` datetime NOT NULL, `commentRateValue` int(1) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `id_comment_2` (`id_comment`,`id_user`), KEY `id_comment` (`id_comment`), KEY `id_user` (`id_user`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentkeyword` ( `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `language` char(2) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `id_field` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `keyword` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, KEY `id_content` (`id_content`,`language`), KEY `id_field` (`id_field`), KEY `keyword` (`keyword`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentsocialforum` ( `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_socialforum` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `is_selected` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id_content`,`id_socialforum`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`), KEY `id_socialforum` (`id_socialforum`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_contentgroupbusinessloc` ( `country` char(2) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `id_group` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `id_content` mediumint(64) NOT NULL, `is_view` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `is_buy` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `contentPrice` float(10,2) default NULL, `contentPriceTax` float(10,2) default NULL, `contentPriceNormal` float(10,2) default NULL, `contentPriceComment` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_group`,`id_content`,`country`), KEY `id_group` (`id_group`), KEY `id_content` (`id_content`), KEY `country` (`country`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
